List of all members.

Public Types

enum  GlobalSceneStatus { PreLoadingObjects, PostLoadingObjects, PreDestroyingObjects, PostDestroyingObjects }
 Enumeration for informing the ISystemScene on what is occuring.

Pre and post loading are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely loading a scene.

Pre and post destroying are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely destroying a scene.

. More...

Detailed Description

ISystemScene is an interface class for managing a scene or scenes in a system.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ISystemScene::GlobalSceneStatus

Enumeration for informing the ISystemScene on what is occuring.

Pre and post loading are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely loading a scene.

Pre and post destroying are used to inform when the framework being and ends completely destroying a scene.

.

pSystem The system this scene belongs to.

ISystem* ISystemScene::GetSystem ( void   )  [inline]

Gets the system this object belongs to.

Returns:
A pointer to the system.

virtual System::Type ISystemScene::GetSystemType ( void   )  [pure virtual]

Gets the system type for this system scene.

This is a shortcut to getting the system type w/o having to go the system first.

Returns:
The type of the system.

Implemented in AIScene, FMODScene, ExplosionScene, OGREGraphicsScene, InputScene, HavokPhysicsScene, FireScene, and ScriptingScene.

virtual System::Changes::BitMask ISystemScene::GetDesiredSystemChanges ( void   )  [inline, virtual]

Returns a bit mask of System Changes that this scene wants to receive changes for. Used to inform the change control manager if this scene should be informed of the change.

Returns:
A System::Changes::BitMask.
